             </li>
             <li id="link16791697">
              <a id="link_16791697" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/silkspices" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16791697,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16791697});">
               Silk, Spices and World Trade
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18068429">
              <a id="link_18068429" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/tudorstuart" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18068429,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18068429});">
               Tudor-Stuart England
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24881019">
              <a id="link_24881019" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/urbanafrica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24881019,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24881019});">
               Urban Africa
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link20621416">
              <a id="link_20621416" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/womensamerica" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20621416,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20621416});">
               Women's America
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22413959">
              <a id="link_22413959" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ww2eurocinema" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22413959,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22413959});">
               World War II in European Cinema
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10699522">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10699522">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10699522">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10136018">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10136018">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10136018">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10136018">
          <div id="boxatt10136018" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12329245">
              <a id="link_12329245" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12329245,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12329218">
              <a id="link_12329218" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12329218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12343016">
              <a id="link_12343016" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12343016,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10147963">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10147963">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10147963">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10147963">
          <div id="boxatt10147963" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12343584">
              <a id="link_12343584" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12343584,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12343602">
              <a id="link_12343602" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search2.itergateway.org/Iter/search.jsp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12343602,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343602}); ">
               ITER
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly literature pertaining to the Middle Ages and Renaissance (400-1700).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12343609">
              <a id="link_12343609" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12343609,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343609}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database with journal articles in the arts, humanities, and social sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12343618">
              <a id="link_12343618" href="http://www.chass.utoronto.ca/amphoras/tocs.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12343618,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343618}); ">
               Table of Contents of Journals of Interest to Classicists (TOCS-IN)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly literature in classical studies.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
